Author: e1ven
Content:
As with the Obama speech video, this really doesn't belong on news.yc. The whole attraction of this site it that it IS targetted.. Initially to startups, and then expanding to "Hacker News".. Please don't try to further broaden it.

As an aside- This is why Slashdot still maintains editors, even in this age of user generated content. Control of message.

Author: aston
Content:
Awesome how I can't see the site in IE because the author doesn't like the browser.

Great way to get people to read your blog. Not to mention the horrid UI even when I fire up the fox...

Author: bayareaguy
Content:
Should low-income minority parents lose the right to raise their own children autonomously?

No.

Author: jraines
Content:
This is from the essays section of his site.

Here's a fun tidbit from his essay on Rails (undated but obviously from right when Rails came out): "I'd also like to mention that the #rubyonrails IRC channel on irc.freenode.net is really good for information. The folks there are very nice, unlike similar channels which want to pound pulpits with their fat heads."

I know, I know -- a foolish consistency, hobgoblins, etc

Author: bayareaguy
Content:
The goal for Utu is to fight the griefers of the Internet with hate.

Sounds like an excellent choice for you Zed.

Ragel does sound interesting. Not as general as Libero ( http://legacy.imatix.com/html/libero/index.htm ) but better for parsing.

Author: jraines
Title: Zed Shaw - The Dark Side of the Semantic Web

Author: aston
Content: On one hand, sucks to be pushed out like that. On the other hand, Sequoia really helped grow that company to something huge. And leaving the company with mega millions has to soften the blow some.

Author: joshwa
Content:
Call it Rule 33 (the one that precedes http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=rule+34) of the Internet:

The primary driver of adoption for all new internet technologies is porn. (c.f. email, BBSs, chat, usenet, http, bittorrent, social networks, etc)

or, more likely, Rule 34a:

Given a reasonably useful internet technology, someone will find a way to use it for porn.

Author: joshwa
Title: Noontime Web Video Revitalizes Lunch at the Desk
